Headline: #3 King Drive, #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Ontario
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive, 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express, 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, 151 Sheridan buses rerouted near Michigan/Ontario.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive, #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, #151 Sheridan buses temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Ontario due to street blockage. 

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, Clark, Wacker, and Michigan and the normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via Illinois, Columbus, Ontario, and Michigan. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Michigan, and 115th due to street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115 buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  115th, Wentworth, 119th, Michigan, and 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Wentworth. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove,  #X4 Cottage Grove Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/35th
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove,  X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily near Cottage Grove/35th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove, #X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily near Cottage Grove/35th.

Southbound buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Indiana, 33rd Blvd., King Drive, 33rd Place, Rhodes, 35th and Cottage Grove including the normal route streets , due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/35th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
